messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Hello. By the end of this shift, most of you will be dead.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Following our demands will increase your chance of survival.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Evil Garden 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Your first task is to kill a crewmember, and place their body above bridge.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: you have three minutes to do this, or we detonate 2 of your implants.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Your next task will be to kill an animal, and put it above bridge, you have 3 minutes to do this.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Jonathon Whirlow, and Dee. F. Rodgers, get back on the station immediately, there will be no more warnings.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Jonathon Whirlow and Dee Rodgers did not meet our demands, they are now dead.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: An animal has died within the required timeframe.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Take the station off of emergency mode, or two of you will be dead,

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Solve this riddle in 30 seconds, or two of you wil be dead.


The more you take, the more you leave behind, what am I?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
The more of this thing you take, the more you leave behind.
Not a footstep.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You failed, the answer was fingerprints.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You must put a functional MMI above bridge in 3 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: I said free the CE, not kill them.
